nodes.text: The Cron Drift was a region of space in the Outer Rim Territories' Auril sector, containing the planet Ossus. The pirate Hondo Ohnaka once planned to auction a forgery of Maz Kanata's Journal in the Drift.

The Cron Drift was first canonically mentioned in the Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying manual Nexus of Power. In the Legends continuity, the Drift first appeared in the novel Dark Apprentice and was an asteroid field in the Auril sector created by the Cron Supernova.
